def vowel_start(stg): 
    return "".join(f"{' ' if c in 'aeiou' else ''}{c}" for c in stg.lower() if c.isalnum()).lstrip()

def vowel_start(st): 
    return ''.join(' ' * (i in 'aeiou') + i for i in st.lower() if i.isalnum()).strip()

def vowel_start(st): 
    return ''.join(f'{" " * (c in "aeiou")}{c}' for c in st.lower() if c.isalnum()).lstrip()
vowel_start=lambda s:''.join(' '*(x in'aeiou')+x*x.isalnum()for x in s.lower()).strip()

import re

def vowel_start(st):
    st = re.sub("[^a-zA-Z0-9]", "", st.lower())
    r = st[0] if len(st) else ""
    for s in st[1:]: r += (" " if s in "aeiou" else "") + s
    return r
